name: A Lot Like Love
description:
Rachel comes home on vacation to not only celebrate, but also get to know Jennifer's boyfriend. Neither Rachel, nor Jennifer, nor her boyfriend even imagine what this will lead to.
A true love story. And the most difficult choice.

Do you believe in love at first sight?
I did not believe it until it happened to me.
One look.
And I was lost ..

Beautifully designed graphics and quiet high-quality musical accompaniment allow you to immerse yourself in the novel, to feel the atmosphere and mood of the characters.
Are you ready to begin? ...
